about.title: ABOUT VENDIT
about.subtitle: Vendit is a marketplace for PocketMine plugins, where you can buy or sell your own plugins.

accordion_1.title: How much does it cost?
accordion_1.text: It's free, we only take a 5% transaction fee for each payment you receive

accordion_2.title: How does it work?
accordion_2.text:
When you will put a plugin online, you will define its price, once a person will buy it the transaction will be paid on your PayPal account in the following minutes,
The user will receive a link by email address to access the download page on which he can download the plugin only once.

accordion_3.title: Is the storage of our plugins secure?
accordion_3.text: Yes, we use a secure storage system, we do not store your plugins on our servers, we use a CDN (Content Delivery Network) to store your plugins, a CDN is used by many websites such as Google, Facebook, etc, all requests to get a plugin is validated or not by a token, if the token is not valid our refuse the request.

accordion_4.title: If I decide to delete a plugin from the sales, is it deleted from your servers?
accordion_4.text: Yes, when you delete a plugin from the sales, it is deleted from our servers, and the download link is no longer valid.

accordion_5.title: How can I contact you?
accordion_5.text: You can contact us from the email address, or through the ticket service on the website.

accordion_6.title: How can I delete my account?
accordion_6.text:
You can delete your account from the settings page, but be careful, once your account is deleted, you will not be able to access your plugins
If you are a seller and you have plugins for sale, your seller page will no longer be accessible and your plugins and data will be destroyed
You will be able to cancel the deletion by reconnecting within 30 days, after these days, it will be impossible for you to recover your data

accordion_7.title: If I get scammed, what do I do?
accordion_7.text:
If you get scammed, you can contact us by email or through the ticket service, we will be able to help you.

To avoid such cases, here is what we do:
All plugins offered for sale are tested and verified by our team within 24 hours
If a plugin is available on the site it means that it works and that it has no problems !
If a seller updates the plugin file, it is also checked by our team.

accordion_8.title: If a seller update a purchased plugin, will I have to pay again?
accordion_8.text:
This question depends on the seller, if the seller when he publishes an update checks the box to send the plugin with its new version to those who have already purchased it, in this case you do not need to pay, you will receive it by mail, or in the dashboard (only one download possible, do not lose it)
If not, you'll have to pay again, but you'll be alerted of the plugin update by mail and your dashboard

accordion_9.title: Can we ask for a refund?
accordion_9.text: No, otherwise it's too easy to get free plugins, and it's a waste of work for the developer

accordion_10.title: How do I know it's not a leak?
accordion_10.text:
We systematically check the plugins, if we have any doubts about its origin we refuse it,
You can also spread the word, if you think it is one, you can report it on its product page
